keyMoments.title: Zoro Asks Mihawk to Train Him
keyMoments.description: Zoro swallows his immense pride and goes down on his knees to beg Dracule Mihawk to train him to become a stronger swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: This is one of the most important character moments for Zoro in the entire series. It demonstrates his complete dedication to Luffy and his willingness to set aside his enormous ego for the sake of his captain and crew.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Reveals He Defeated All Humandrills
keyMoments.description: Zoro informs Mihawk that he has already defeated all of the Humandrills outside the castle, surprising Mihawk with this feat of strength.
keyMoments.significance: Proves Zoro's worthiness to be trained by Mihawk and shows his significant growth even before the formal training begins.
keyMoments.quote: I defeated all of them. Now the only one left to beat is you.

keyMoments.title: Zoro's Loyalty to Luffy Revealed
keyMoments.description: When questioned by Mihawk, Zoro reveals that his true motivation for wanting to become stronger is not personal ambition but his dedication to Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of Zoro's loyalty to his captain and marks a shift in his relationship with Mihawk from pure rivalry to mentor-student.
keyMoments.quote: I want to overcome you. I need to become stronger... for him.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Explains the 3D2Y Message
keyMoments.description: Zoro decodes Luffy's hidden message to Perona, explaining that the Straw Hats will reunite in two years instead of three days.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's understanding of Luffy's strategic thinking and his role as the first mate in interpreting the captain's intentions.
keyMoments.quote: The original plan was to meet up in three days. But now it's two years.

reveals.information: Zoro is willing to completely set aside his pride and kneel before his rival to become stronger for Luffy
Zoro has become strong enough to defeat all the Humandrills on Kuraigana Island

name.japanese: ジュラキュール・ミホーク

keyMoments.title: Mihawk Recognizes Zoro's True Motivation
keyMoments.description: Mihawk realizes that Zoro wants to become stronger for Luffy, not for his own ambitions, showing a deeper understanding of Zoro's character.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Mihawk respects loyalty and dedication, seeing these qualities as worthy of his mentorship.

keyMoments.title: Mihawk Agrees to Train Zoro
keyMoments.description: After understanding Zoro's motivation, Mihawk agrees to train him once Perona heals his injuries, despite the irony of training someone who aims to surpass and defeat him.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the beginning of Zoro's two-year training period under the World's Greatest Swordsman, crucial for his development.
keyMoments.quote: Very well. Once your wounds are healed, I will train you.

reveals.information: Mihawk respects selfless loyalty and is willing to mentor those who demonstrate it

relationships.description: Mihawk agrees to become Zoro's mentor after recognizing Zoro's selfless desire to become stronger for his captain.

evolutionMoments.description: Their relationship evolves from pure rivalry to mentor-student when Mihawk agrees to train Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Brook Reflects on Luffy's Kindness
keyMoments.description: While being displayed as a freak show attraction, Brook holds a newspaper and reflects on how grateful he is to Luffy for everything Luffy has done for him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Brook's dedication to his captain and his willingness to endure hardship while waiting for Luffy's signal.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you, Luffy... for everything you've done for me.

keyMoments.title: Brook Performs 'Bone to Be Wild'
keyMoments.description: Brook performs his new single 'Bone to Be Wild' for the crowd, showing his determination to move forward and continue to support Luffy as a musician.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Brook's decision to use his time during the separation productively, setting up his future career as a famous musician.

reveals.information: Brook is developing his musical career during the separation to help the crew in the future

keyMoments.title: Robin Decides to Join Revolutionary Army
keyMoments.description: Robin makes the decision to go with the Revolutionary Army to Baltigo to meet Monkey D. Dragon, prompted by memories of Ohara and Luffy saving her.
keyMoments.significance: Critical character development as Robin chooses to learn from the Revolutionary Army, setting up her two-year training period.
keyMoments.quote: I've decided to go to Baltigo.

keyMoments.title: Robin Reflects on Ohara and Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: Robin has flashbacks of Ohara's destruction and Saul's final words, followed by memories of Luffy saving her at Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional context for Robin's decision and shows how Luffy's actions gave her the will to live and fight.

reveals.information: Robin decides to temporarily join the Revolutionary Army for training

keyMoments.title: Usopp Resolves to Train
keyMoments.description: Usopp makes the decision to train seriously for Luffy's sake, and Heracles begins teaching him about Pop Greens and survival techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Usopp's two-year training period where he will master Pop Greens for the New World.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to become the King of Snipers!

reveals.information: Usopp begins learning about Pop Greens from Heracles

keyMoments.title: Perona Helps Heal Zoro
keyMoments.description: Perona is tasked with healing Zoro's injuries before Mihawk will begin training him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Perona's continued involvement with Zoro and Mihawk at Kuraigana Island.

keyMoments.title: Perona Learns About 3D2Y
keyMoments.description: Zoro explains Luffy's hidden 3D2Y message to Perona, revealing the Straw Hats' plan to reunite in two years.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Perona as a confidant to Zoro during the timeskip period.

keyMoments.title: Heracles Begins Training Usopp
keyMoments.description: Touched by Usopp's determination, Heracles starts teaching Usopp about Pop Greens and survival techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Heracles as Usopp's mentor during the two-year timeskip.

reveals.information: Heracles is willing to mentor those who show genuine determination

relationships.description: Heracles becomes Usopp's mentor, teaching him about Pop Greens.

evolutionMoments.description: Heracles agrees to train Usopp after seeing his determination.
